title: Watch: Mixed emotions as people return to street of New Orleans attack
description: As businesses and bars re-open, the BBC's Carl Nasman talks to people returning to Bourbon Street.
excerpt: As businesses and bars re-open, the BBC's Carl Nasman talks to people returning to Bourbon Street.
text: Bourbon Street in New Orleans has reopened after being closed for investigation since the deadly attack on New Year's Day. The BBC's Carl Nasman spoke to people about how they felt as they returned to the street where the attack took place. Shamsud-Din Jabbar drove a truck through Bourbon Street before he was shot dead by officers in the early hours of 1 January, killing 14 people. At least 39 people are still being treated at hospitals in the area, according to BBC's US partner CBS.
html:
Bourbon Street in New Orleans has reopened after being closed for investigation since the deadly attack on New Year's Day.

The BBC's Carl Nasman spoke to people about how they felt as they returned to the street where the attack took place.

Shamsud-Din Jabbar drove a truck through Bourbon Street before he was shot dead by officers in the early hours of 1 January, killing 14 people.

At least 39 people are still being treated at hospitals in the area, according to BBC's US partner CBS.
